column4: here's a fun question: I'm looking for suggestions for open source infrastructure (no desktop apps) which can be deployed as non-intrusive pilots for a large public institution (meaning, they don't replace or intrude upon any of the existing Microsoft systems). Suggestions?
cygwin is nifty, but the institution has no exposure to FLOSS or UNIX. I'm leaning towards online systems like Alfresco for example
I'm googling for Alfresco right now
